Package ohos.agp.components.element

Class InlaidElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.element.Element
      • ohos.agp.components.element.ElementWrapper
        • ohos.agp.components.element.InlaidElement

  • public class InlaidElement
extends ElementWrapper
    Inlays an element with another element based on a specific distance or proportion from the content bounds.

    This class can be used when Component requires a background that is smaller than the Component's actual bounds.

    Since:
    7

    • Constructor Detail

      • InlaidElement

        public InlaidElement​(Element element,
                     int inlay)
        A constructor used to create an inlaid element with the specified inlay in pixels.
        Parameters:
        element - Indicates the element with which the new element will be inlaid.
        inlay - Indicates the inlay around the element, in pixels. The value must be greater than or equal to 0.
        Since:
        7

      • InlaidElement

        public InlaidElement​(Element element,
                     int inlayLeft,
                     int inlayTop,
                     int inlayRight,
                     int inlayBottom)
        A constructor used to create an inlaid element with the specified inlay in pixels for every side.
        Parameters:
        element - Indicates the element with which the new element will be inlaid.
        inlayLeft - Indicates the left inlay in pixels. The value must be greater than or equal to 0.
        inlayTop - Indicates the top inlay in pixels. The value must be greater than or equal to 0.
        inlayRight - Indicates the right inlay in pixels. The value must be greater than or equal to 0.
        inlayBottom - Indicates the bottom inlay in pixels. The value must be greater than or equal to 0.
        Since:
        7

      • InlaidElement

        public InlaidElement​(Element element,
                     float inlayRatio)
        A constructor used to create an inlaid element with the specified inlay in proportion from the content bounds for every side.
        Parameters:
        element - Indicates the element object to inlay
        inlayRatio - Indicates the inlay value in proportion from the content bounds. Valid range: [0, 1)
        Since:
        7

      • InlaidElement

        public InlaidElement​(Element element,
                     float inlayLeftRatio,
                     float inlayTopRatio,
                     float inlayRightRatio,
                     float inlayBottomRatio)
        A constructor used to create an inlaid element with the specified inlay in proportion from the content bounds for every side.
        Parameters:
        element - Indicates the element with which the new element will be inlaid.
        inlayLeftRatio - Indicates the left inlay value in proportion from the content width. Valid range: [0,1)
        inlayTopRatio - Indicates the top inlay value in proportion from the content width. Valid range: [0,1)
        inlayRightRatio - Indicates the right inlay value in proportion from the content width. Valid range: [0,1)
        inlayBottomRatio - Indicates the bottom inlay value in proportion from the content width. Valid range: [0,1)
        Since:
        7
